channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Team Concert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Team Concert

item.title: CVE-2018-1408|2024-09-16T19:56:49.896Z -- ibm -- rational%20team%20concert
item.description: IBM Rational Team Concert 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138446.

item.title: CVE-2020-4975|2024-09-16T21:07:17.435Z -- ibm -- rational%20team%20concert
